1: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------------
    2: %%% File    : mod_http_notification_SUITE
    3: %%% Author  : Baibossynv Valery <baibossynov.valery@gmail.com>
    4: %%% Purpose : Testing passing via http
    5: %%% Created : 16 Dec 2015 by Baibossynv Valery <baibossynov.valery@gmail.com>
    6: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------------
    7: 
    8: -module(mod_http_notification_SUITE).
    9: -author("baibossynov.valery@gmail.com").
   10: 
   11: -compile(export_all).
   12: 
   13: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   14: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   15: 
   16: 
   17: %%%===================================================================
   18: %%% Suite configuration
   19: %%%===================================================================
   20: 
   21: all() ->
   22:     [{group, mod_http_notification_tests}].
   23: 
   24: all_tests() ->
   25:     [simple_message, simple_message_no_listener, simple_message_failing_listener].
   26: 
   27: groups() ->
   28:     [{mod_http_notification_tests, [sequence], all_tests()}].
   29: 
   30: 
   31: suite() ->
   32:     escalus:suite().
   33: 
   34: set_worker_timeout() ->
   35:     dynamic_modules:restart(host(), mod_http_notification, [{worker_timeout, 500}, {host, "http://localhost:8000"}]),
   36:     ok.
   37: 
   38: host() -> <<"localhost">>.
   39: 
   40: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
   41:     Config1 = escalus:init_per_suite(Config0),
   42:     set_worker_timeout(),
   43:     escalus:create_users(Config1, escalus:get_users({by_name, [alice, bob]})).
   44: 
   45: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   46:     escalus:delete_users(Config, {by_name, [alice, bob]}),
   47:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
   48: 
   49: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   50:     Config.
   51: 
   52: end_per_group(_GroupName, _Config) ->
   53:     ok.
   54: 
   55: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   56:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
   57: 
   58: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   59:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
   60: 
   61: start_mod_http_notification(Opts) ->
   62:     Domain = ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
   63:     dynamic_modules:start(Domain, mod_http_notification, Opts).
   64: 
   65: 
   66: %%%===================================================================
   67: %%% offline tests
   68: %%%===================================================================
   69: 
   70: simple_message(Config) ->
   71:     %% we expect one notification message
   72:     http_helper:listen_once(self(), 8000, [<<"alice">>, <<"Simple">>]),
   73:     do_simple_message(Config, <<"Hi, Simple!">>),
   74:     %% fail if we didn't receive http notification
   75:     Notified = receive
   76:                    {ok, got_http_request, _} ->
   77:                        true
   78:                after 2000 ->
   79:                        false
   80:                end,
   81:     assert_true("notified", Notified).
   82: 
   83: simple_message_no_listener(Config) ->
   84:     do_simple_message(Config, <<"Hi, NoListener!">>).
   85: 
   86: simple_message_failing_listener(Config) ->
   87:     http_helper:listen_once(self(), 8000, none, none),
   88:     do_simple_message(Config, <<"Hi, Failing!">>).
   89: 
   90: do_simple_message(Config, Msg) ->
   91:     %% Alice sends a message to Bob, who is offline
   92:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}],
   93:         fun(Alice) -> escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(bob, Msg)) end),
   94: 
   95:     %% Bob logs in
   96:     Bob = login_send_presence(Config, bob),
   97: 
   98:     %% He receives his initial presence and the message
   99:     Stanzas = escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
  100: %%  ct:pal("Stanzas:~p", [Stanzas]),
  101:     escalus_new_assert:mix_match([is_presence, is_chat(Msg)], Stanzas),
  102:     escalus_cleaner:clean(Config).
  103: 
  104: 
  105: %%%===================================================================
  106: %%% Custom predicates
  107: %%%===================================================================
  108: 
  109: is_chat(Content) ->
  110:     fun(Stanza) -> escalus_pred:is_chat_message(Content, Stanza) end.
  111: 
  112: %%%===================================================================
  113: %%% Helpers
  114: %%%===================================================================
  115: 
  116: login_send_presence(Config, User) ->
  117:     Spec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, User),
  118:     {ok, Client} = escalus_client:start(Config, Spec, <<"dummy">>),
  119:     escalus:send(Client, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  120:     Client.
  121: 
  122: 
  123: assert_true(_, true) ->
  124:     ok;
  125: assert_true(Name, _) ->
  126:     ct:fail("~p is not true, while should be", [Name]).
